Articles.Content:
Hi, I`m the new guy

Really love the game/sim! Only been flying for 3 days, but it`s so addictive. Even when Jeb gets stuck in orbit(first around Kerbin then Mun) without power or fuel to get home it is really fun.

Would love to see more sounding rockets and telemetry simulation (thats my real life job after all ^^).

Cheers,

Kim

I was a newbie last week, recruitment seems to be going well, Jeb takes his coffee white with one sugar

Sounding rockets as in meteorological research/survey work?

Cheers

Sounding rockets as in meteorological research/survey work?

Yep, meteorological, technological and near space measurements. Mostly ballistic trajectories, with all the pros and cons that brings with it.
